title: Separate Business Logic from Presentation
description: Separate the data processing logic from the display logic
starterCode:
# Separate concerns: data processing vs display
def process_user_data(name, age):
    # Business logic mixed with presentation
    print(f"Processing user: {name}")
    processed_name = name.upper()
    processed_age = age + 1
    print(f"Result: {processed_name}, {processed_age}")
    return processed_name, processed_age

process_user_data("Alice", 25)
solution:
# Separated concerns
def process_user_data(name, age):
    # Pure business logic
    return name.upper(), age + 1

def display_result(name, age):
    # Pure presentation logic
    print(f"Result: {name}, {age}")

name, age = process_user_data("Alice", 25)
display_result(name, age)
hints: Business logic should return data, not print it
Create separate functions for different concerns
